Text: Effective Date: July 1, 2023
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: We may update this Notice from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the Effective Date above and, in some cases, we may provide you with more prominent notice (for example, by adding a statement to our homepage or sending you a notification), such as in connection with making material changes to this Notice. We encourage you to review this Notice regularly to stay informed about our information practices and the choices available to you.
Label: Updated Privacy Policy

Text: Identifiers (such as your IP address and contact information, including name and email address)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Characteristics of Protected Classifications Under California or U.S. Law (such as your age and other demographic information)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected
Categories of Personal Information Collected

Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Geolocation Data (such as city of residence)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We use this personal information to:

 

●      Provide, maintain, and improve our products and services; 

●      Analyze trends and statistics, learn more about your shopping preferences and your interaction with our Services, and improve your shopping experience; and

●      Detect, investigate, and prevent security incidents and protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Audio, Electronic, or Visual Information (such as phone recordings when you call customer service and photos and video recordings captured in our stores)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We use this personal information to:

 

●      Provide, maintain, and improve our products and services; 

●      Detect, investigate, and prevent security incidents and protect against malicious, deceptive, fraudulent, or illegal activity; and

●      Provide customer service.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Inferences about you (such as approximate location derived from IP address or information drawn about your preferences based on your behavior)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text:
We use this personal information to:

 

●      Provide, maintain, and improve our products and services; 

●      Analyze trends and statistics, learn more about your shopping preferences and your interaction with our Services, and improve your shopping experience; and

●      Personalize and improve the Services and provide content or features that match your profile and interests.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Other personal information that relates to or is reasonably capable of being associated with you (for example, certain information you submit in connection with a product review or in response to a survey)
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Label: Categories of Personal Information Shared / Disclosed

Text: As described in more detail in our Privacy Policy, we collect personal information from different sources, including: directly from you; automatically when you access or use our Services or shop in our stores; and from third-party sources, including our partners that provide or lead REI experiences, the financial institutions we partner with if you apply for certain co-branded financial products, and other users if they decide to purchase a gift for you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: We generally do not collect information that is considered “sensitive” under state privacy laws. In the limited circumstances that we do, such as collection of your account username and password, which is designated as “sensitive” under the California Consumer Privacy Act, we do not use or disclose sensitive personal information for the purpose of inferring characteristics about you.
Label: Categories of Personal Information Collected

Text: Opting Out of Sales, Sharing, and Targeted Advertising. As described above, you have the right to opt out of having your personal information sold, shared, or used for targeted advertising.
Label: Description of Right to Opt-out of sale of PI

Text: ou may opt out by following the prompts . You may opt out of sales, sharing, or targeted advertising associated with your email address, or other information we may disclose to our advertising or other partners so they can show you ads that are more relevant to your interests, by visiting this form and submitting the required information.  If you are a resident of California, you can also opt out by visiting our Services with a legally recognized opt-out preference signal enabled, such as the Global Privacy Control.
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Access, Correction, and Deletion. You have the right to (1) request to know more about and access your personal information, including in a portable format, (2) request deletion of your personal information, and (3) request correction of inaccurate personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Know PI Collected

Text: Access, Correction, and Deletion. You have the right to (1) request to know more about and access your personal information, including in a portable format, (2) request deletion of your personal information, and (3) request correction of inaccurate personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Delete

Text: Access, Correction, and Deletion. You have the right to (1) request to know more about and access your personal information, including in a portable format, (2) request deletion of your personal information, and (3) request correction of inaccurate personal information.
Label: Description of Right to Correct Information

Text: To request access, correction, or deletion of your personal information, you may submit this webform or contact REI Customer Service at 1-800-426-4840
Label: Methods to exercise rights

Text: Nondiscrimination\n\nWe will not discriminate against you for exercising your privacy rights.
Label: Description of Right to Non-discrimination on exercising rights
